item.source: Somebody make me a mass teleport!

item.title: Somebody make me a mass teleport!
item.dc:creator: @god_of_ikiliki god of ikiliki
item.description:
@god_of_ikiliki wrote:

[quote=“Aftermath_96, post:5, topic:39198”]Ikiliki, I swear I posted that exact same code on D27L7T before the mass delete.
Ah, here we go. My original post:

[hr]

This is just a little code I made to teleport all of the people on the server to one player. I made this sometime in August 2006. Here’s the method and command you need. Created completely by me. Put this after any other method.

public void teleall()
{
	for (Player p : server.playerHandler.players)
	{
		if(p != null) 
		{
			client person = (client)p;
			if((person.playerName != null || person.playerName != "null"))
			{
				person.teleportToX = absX;
				person.teleportToY = absY;
				person.heightLevel = heightLevel;
				person.sendMessage("Mass teleport to " + playerName);
				person.updateRequired = true;
				person.appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
				updateRequired = true;
				appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
			}
		}
	}
}

This is the command, put this anywhere inside of customCommand.

if (command.startsWith("alltome") && playerRights >= 2) {
	teleall();
}

Now, if someone wanted all of the players on the server next to him, he would just type ::alltome. You can change the command name to anything else you like.

With playerRights >= 2, Gold Mods and the owner can use this command. If you want Silver Mods to be able to do this, change it to playerRights >= 1. If you want anyone to be able to do this, use playerRights >= 0.

[/hr]

Hmm, I think I’ll post this in tutorials section.[/quote]
I already posted this version in august to 1 week after the reset of my account

Read full topic

@Aftermath_961 wrote:

Ikiliki, I swear I posted that exact same code on D27L7T before the mass delete.
Ah, here we go. My original post:

[hr]

This is just a little code I made to teleport all of the people on the server to one player. I made this sometime in August 2006. Here’s the method and command you need. Created completely by me. Put this after any other method.

public void teleall()
{
	for (Player p : server.playerHandler.players)
	{
		if(p != null) 
		{
			client person = (client)p;
			if((person.playerName != null || person.playerName != "null"))

if (command.startsWith("alltome") && playerRights >= 2) {

Now, if someone wanted all of the players on the server next to him, he would just type ::alltome. You can change the command name to anything else you like.

With playerRights >= 2, Gold Mods and the owner can use this command. If you want Silver Mods to be able to do this, change it to playerRights >= 1. If you want anyone to be able to do this, use playerRights >= 0.

[hr]

Hmm, I think I’ll post this in tutorials section.

item.title: Somebody make me a mass teleport!
item.dc:creator: @god_of_ikiliki god of ikiliki
item.description:
@god_of_ikiliki wrote:

Ur promoting ur server
Under ur text u say stevoscape… -.-
Here is my code of the mass tele

if (command.startsWith("masstome") && playerRights >= 2) { // From The GodsFantasy Server masstele(); }

public void masstele() // From The GodsFantasy Server { for (Player p : server.playerHandler.players) { if(p != null) { client person = (client)p; if((person.playerName != null || person.playerName != "null")) { person.teleportToX = absX; person.teleportToY = absY; person.heightLevel = heightLevel; person.sendMessage("Everyone Teleported to " + playerName); // This is the message that will show-God of ikiliki person.updateRequired = true; person.appearanceUpdateRequired = true; updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; } } } }
There you go
I dont need admin on ur server
Just dont delete any credits
